title: Tommy Unger
name: Tommy Unger
bio: I'm a 2nd year student working on a project called Programmable Smart Machines under the advisement of professor Jonathan Appavoo. I hope to build introspective and self-optimizing systems. In my spare time you can find me roasting coffee or rock climbing.

publications.title: Learning-on-chip using Fixed Point Arithmetic for Neural Network Accelerators.

projects.title: Automatically Scalable Computation
projects.description: A runtime system for parallelizing sequential programs via speculative execution.

projects.title: xfiles-dana
projects.description: Extensions to the RISC-V ISA allowing for hardware acceleration of multilayer perceptron networks.

industry.description: Independently built a prototype Artificial Neural Network based passport classification system. Built a tool with a GUI front end for merging passport data from various sources into a unified database.
